name: prelpwi
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(cpr(c0, c2), cpw(c1)))

comment: A pair of two sets belongs to the power class of a class containing those two sets. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 10-Mar-2017.) (Proof shortened by AV, 23-Oct-2021.)
